Name: team_size_at_least_min
Description: Team must meet a minimum size threshold

Name: worker_status_active_only
Description: Only active workers considered for assignment

Name: user_story_priority_at_least
Description: Only consider stories with minimum priority

Name: epic_status_in_progress_or_new
Description: Only epics not closed are selectable

Name: sprint_within_date_range
Description: Sprint must fall within project dates

Name: backlog_status_active_only
Description: Only active product backlogs are included

Name: blocker_status_unresolved_only
Description: Consider only unresolved blockers in risk calc
